meanings.sent1: The children at the party were the plunkiest dancers on the floor.
meanings.sent2: She always has the plunkiest attitude, no matter the situation.
meanings.sent3: The plunkiest puppy in the litter was always up for a game of fetch.
meanings.sent4: His plunkiest personality shone through during the performance.
meanings.sent5: The plunkiest colors of the sunset painted the sky in a vibrant display.

meanings.definition: Plunkiest (adverb): in a lively or spirited manner
meanings.sent1: She skipped plunkiest down the street, full of joy.
meanings.sent2: The band played their instruments plunkiest during the concert.
meanings.sent3: The comedian told jokes plunkiest, making everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The leaves rustled plunkiest in the wind, creating a soothing sound.
meanings.sent5: The children laughed and played plunkiest in the park.

meanings.definition: Plunkiest (noun): the quality of being lively or spirited
meanings.sent1: Her enthusiasm for life was the plunkiest I had ever seen.
meanings.sent2: The plunkiest of the team members always lifted everyone's spirits.
meanings.sent3: The plunkiest of the group, he was the heart of every gathering.
meanings.sent4: The plunkiest of the flowers in the garden attracted many bees.
meanings.sent5: The plunkiest of the music filled the room with energy and joy.
